tool_description: Creates detailed topographical maps of artwork surface texture using 3D scanning or photogrammetry to document brushwork patterns and surface irregularities.

mapping_method.description: Surface mapping technique (3D scanner, photogrammetry, structured light)

coverage_areas.description: Areas to map (full surface, details, signature, damaged areas)

error_messages: Invalid artwork_id: Provide a valid artwork identifier from metadata record.
Unsupported mapping method: Use one of [3D scanner, photogrammetry, structured light].
Invalid resolution: Resolution must be between 10-500 microns.
Empty coverage areas: Must specify at least one area to map.
Insufficient surface contrast: Artwork surface may not provide sufficient contrast for accurate mapping.
usage: Specify artwork and mapping parameters. Tool creates detailed 3D surface maps showing texture patterns and topographical features.

texture_patterns.description: Identified texture patterns and their characteristics
